reviews.review_header: Good shoes with lots of great features but can be improved.
reviews.review_text: Lots of good features but I would change some things. I have put about 300 miles on these walking, hiking, and running on a variety of surfaces. The Adidas Kanadia 8 shoe is a good all-arounder. Does everything good but nothing great. Traction is pretty good on road and dirt but is very slick on some wet surfaces like wet rocks and wet wood. The cloud cushioning is very good and is responsive yet dampens. These shoes have good feel on the trail and are not too stiff. Fairly lightweight but still pretty durable. Running on the trail is pretty good. The soles hookup well on dirt and rocky surfaces. However, wet surfaces can be very slippery. Running on road is decent. When running on the road, I kept wanting my road running shoes, however, not many shoes are able to perform well on the trail as well as the road so this isn't really a big issue. The fit is for me was correct in size but a bit narrow in the mid-section. Toebox is roomy. My main issue for the fit was the narrowness and that the lace configuration. To me, there should be more holes for the laces because it was difficult to make the shoe fit comfortably because there isn't enough even pressure of the laces. More holes should solve that. Mid-section support was good but again narrow and I don't have an overly wide foot. Just average width. The toebox material has shown some wear from rubbing. It would be nice to implement some material like the stretchy Nike Flyknit material to the toebox to make the show fit more snugly be a more durable.

I bought these sneakers because I wanted to replace some trail sneakers and I something in green that was reasonably priced. These fit and feel great. They actually surpassed my expectations since they are so comfortable and solidly constructed. I could walk, hike, run for hours if I was in that kinda shape. Another plus is the strap on the rear of the shoe (not sure what it is called). this helps keep trail pants (I dunno why they make them all like bell bottoms lol) up off the ground if they are wide bottom boot cut. A great value and a great looking pair of kicks.
Fits perfectly and might be the most comfortable shoes I've ever wore!!!

My son is notoriously hard to buy shoes for. He's 6'2" and up until now wore Wide shoes. For Christmas I got him a pair of another brand in 13W and they were too loose, so looking for another pair that would still run a little wider than normal these popped up and they fit the bill perfectly. So happy to not have to go shoe shopping at the store during the season. These shoes have a nice little heft to them and appear durable enough to withstand teenager shenanigans at least for a few months until he grows again.

reviews.review_header: Sturdy trail runners. So far so good. Excellent soccer referee shoes.
reviews.review_text: Great runners so far. I needed sturdy trail shoes and these are working well. I'm putting them to hard use and holding up well after a month.
Nice looking shoe and seemed comfy. The toebox wasn't large enough for me, which is a a frequent problem.
great fit and the last pair of these i had purchased lasted great and were quite comfortable.

reviews.review_header: Great all-around shoe. I run just as fast (not very) in these as I do my expensive running shoes.
reviews.review_text: Great shoe at a great value. The low price had me nervous, but I've been super impressed. I usually buy higher end Adidas Boost running shoes and the size matched up very well. These are very versatile- they look decent enough to wear around town, they have an aggressive tread for the trail, I also use them to golf when I travel. Super-satisfied.
great shoe at a great price
Very comfortable and lightweight
consideably lighter than the TR6 version of this shoe; wonder how it will hold up; the heavier version did very well
Really nice shoes. It about a half size small.
Ordered a bigger size because of other reviews. Excellent, super comfortable shoe. Love the look and feel.
Could use more front foot padding
The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Usually wear 11 had to return for 11 1/2. Amazing cushioning.
Great looking shoe, nice traction. Unfortunately was too small. Have heard Adidas does run a little small, but thought I'd give it a chance. Oh well. Free return with Prime!
Comfortable right from the box! Great shoes but I am unable to get them comfortably tight on my feet. There is a lot of pressure on the top of the foot when tied really tight...
Digging my new kicks!
Great shoes. Look forward to wearing them in the nicer weather. Anticipating that they will be as durable and rugged as the Kanadia's I had four years ago.
Very comfort

reviews.review_header: Great all-around shoe. I run just as fast (not very) in these as I do my expensive running shoes.
reviews.review_text: Great shoe at a great value. The low price had me nervous, but I've been super impressed. I usually buy higher end Adidas Boost running shoes and the size matched up very well. These are very versatile- they look decent enough to wear around town, they have an aggressive tread for the trail, I also use them to golf when I travel. Super-satisfied.

Very sharp shoes. I got the blue and they are very nice looking. The problem I have with Adidas is the sizing. You should order at minimum one full size over what you currently wear. I returned my first pair without any issues and my replacement came extremely fast. Very happy with how they handled the return.

reviews.review_header: great sneaker - order a size up
reviews.review_text: i am really happy with these sneakers. great arch support, very comfortable. i could def wear these all day. my advice is to order a size up. i usually wear an 11 in sneakers so that is what i initially ordered. i wasnt aware of the 'adidas - half size up' rule. however, in my case, based on how tight the 11's were, i went a full size up with the replacement pair. very happy.
consideably lighter than the TR6 version of this shoe; wonder how it will hold up; the heavier version did very well
The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Usually wear 11 had to return for 11 1/2. Amazing cushioning.
Comfortable right from the box! Great shoes but I am unable to get them comfortably tight on my feet. There is a lot of pressure on the top of the foot when tied really tight...
Great looking shoe, nice traction. Unfortunately was too small. Have heard Adidas does run a little small, but thought I'd give it a chance. Oh well. Free return with Prime!
Great shoes. Look forward to wearing them in the nicer weather. Anticipating that they will be as durable and rugged as the Kanadia's I had four years ago.
I buy Adidas shoes because their sizing is consistent from model to model and these shoes are no exception. Comfortable and lightweight.
Design is good

Shoes were perfect. Exactly as pictured and described. Thanks.
Great service. Delivery on time. Great fit. Love the shoes
